text: Clayton Keith Yeutter, ONZM (December 10, 1930 - March 4, 2017) was an American politician. He served as United States Secretary of Agriculture under President George H. W. Bush from 1989 to 1991 before serving as Counselor to the President in 1992. He served as United States Trade Representative from 1985 to 1989 and as Chairman for the Republican National Committee from 1991 until 1992. Yeutter died from colorectal cancer in Potomac, Maryland on March 4, 2017, aged 86.Clayton Yeutter, former U.S. secretary of agriculture and native Nebraskan, dies at 86 ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography at the Miller Center of Public Affairs *Profile at Hogan Lovells *Yeutter's USTR Nomination Hearing on the Senate Finance Committee Website Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Maryland Category:United States Secretaries of Agriculture Category:United States Trade Representatives Category:Politicians from Nebraska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Officers of the New Zealand Order of Merit
title: Clayton Keith Yeutter
